net.ljcomputing.service

Interface ModelService<T extends net.ljcomputing.model.Model,R extends net.ljcomputing.repository.impl.ModelRepository<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Model associated with the service
    R - the ModelRepository associated with the service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractService

    public interface ModelService<T extends net.ljcomputing.model.Model,R extends net.ljcomputing.repository.impl.ModelRepository<T>>
    Service interface shared by all services.
    Author:
    James G. Willmore
